\ Privacy Policy

Hospital and Clinic Locator is developed and owned by NeoDev. This privacy policy outlines the types of information that our app collects, how we use that information, and how we protect it.

By using our app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

Information Collection and Use

Our app collects the following types of information:

Location data: We collect your location data using the following permissions: ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION and ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION. This data is used to determine your current location and provide you with information on the nearest healthcare facilities.

Camera and storage access: We request permission to access your device's camera and storage (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) when you use the 'Add Facilities' feature. This is used to upload a photo or take a picture of the facility you wish to add.

Internet access: Our app requires the INTERNET permission to access and display data from our servers and to provide you with healthcare information.

We do not collect, store or share any personally identifiable information about our users. The information collected by our app is used solely to improve the functionality and user experience.

Data Storage and Security

All data collected by our app is stored locally on your device and is not transmitted to any external servers. We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access and disclosure.

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
